name: PSG Soccer Freestyle
description:
Show your freestyle soccer skills to the world! Perform incredible tricks and juggles alongside Neymar Jr, Mbappé, Di María and many other PSG stars, from both male and female teams, in this OFFICIAL PSG GAME!

SOME OF THE NEAT FEATURES:
- Create and customize your character with tons of cool items and accessories!
- Collect trick cards to learn new freestyle soccer moves and improve them!
- Challenge male and female PSG Stars to play along with them!
- Play as PSG stars in unique challenges all around the world!
- Compete with your friends in the leaderboards and let them know who's the best!

A free and essential game for all sports fans. Get on the field with Paris Saint-Germain!
